name: Bladesinging
description: Bladesingers master a tradition of wizardry that incorporates swordplay and dance, blending magic with melee combat.

2.name: Training in War and Song
2.description: You gain proficiency with light armor, one type of one-handed melee weapon of your choice, and Performance. You also gain proficiency in Bladesinger tools.

2.name: Bladesong
2.description: You can invoke a magical song to gain bonuses to AC, speed, Constitution saves, and Acrobatics checks.

6.name: Extra Attack
6.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. One of those attacks can be a cantrip.

10.name: Song of Defense
10.description: You can expend a spell slot to reduce damage you take while your Bladesong is active.

14.name: Song of Victory
14.description: You add your Intelligence modifier to the damage of your melee weapon attacks while your Bladesong is active.
